headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Content type of the request. Allowed value: application/json

parameters.name: comment_status
parameters.description: Comment status. Enum values: ALL , PUBLIC , HIDDEN . Default: ["ALL"]

parameters.name: comment_type
parameters.description: Comment type. Enum values: ALL , COMMENT , REPLY . Default: ["ALL"]

parameters.name: search_field
parameters.description: Field to search by. Enum values: ADGROUP_ID

parameters.name: comment_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the comments that you want to export

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Enum values: CREATE_TIME , LIKES , REPLIES

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: ASC , DESC

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start date of the time range that you want to get results, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD .

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End date of the time range that you want to get results, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD .

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language of the headers. Enum values: EN , JA , ZH . Default: EN .
